# 恋爱厚黑学

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lianai-houheixue
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lianai-houheixue
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lianai-houheixue
lianai-houheixue <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lianai-houheixue
lianai-houheixue <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
